## *Getting Started with R and Network Visualization*

----

<br>

In this section of the course, we begin working with [R](http://cran.r-project.org/). We will focus on three goals:  

  1. An introduction to [R](http://cran.r-project.org/) to familiarize users with [R](http://cran.r-project.org/).  
  
  2. An introduction to network analysis in [R](http://cran.r-project.org/) covers how network objects are created and manipulated using the [sna](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/sna/index.html) package.  
  
  3. Basic network visualization is reviewed using the [sna](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/sna/index.html) package.
